original_title: At Dawn: Good Manners To Look Good
overview: Anthony Gopaul is experiencing a hypnotic and surreal happening as he sits alone in his living room. He relives disappointments, cravings, and ecstasy whilst starring at his surroundings. As he faces hallucinations, visions of masculinity and spirituality flood his home. Viewers witness explorations of the surreal and otherness set against the backdrop of a South London residence.
title: At Dawn: Good Manners To Look Good
